SECTION.DESC: Apart from taking new pictures, the Camera API also lets you access existing images on the device's gallery

CODE.RUBY:
def select_picture_from_gallery Rho::Camera.choose_picture({}, url_for(:action => :picture_taken_callback)) end
def picture_taken_callback # Did we really take a picture? if (@params["status"]=="ok") # If so, show it Rho::WebView.navigate(url_for(:action => :show_picture, :query => {:image => Rho::Application.expandDatabaseBlobFilePath(@params["imageUri"])})) else # Otherwise we are done here Rho::WebView.navigate(url_for(:action => :index)) end end
